games.checkers

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • joueur.BaseGame
      • games.checkers.Game

  • public class Game
extends joueur.BaseGame
    The simple version of American Checkers. An 8x8 board with 12 checkers on each side that must move diagonally to the opposing side until kinged.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int boardHeight
      The height of the board for the Y component of a checker.
      int boardWidth
      The width of the board for X component of a checker.
      Checker checkerMoved
      The checker that last moved and must be moved because only one checker can move during each players turn.
      boolean checkerMovedJumped
      If the last checker that moved jumped, meaning it can move again.
      java.util.List<Checker> checkers
      All the checkers currently in the game.
      Player currentPlayer
      The player whose turn it is currently.
      int currentTurn
      The current turn number, starting at 0 for the first player's turn.
      static java.lang.String gameVersion
      The hash of the game version we have locally.
      int maxTurns
      The maximum number of turns before the game will automatically end.
      java.util.List<Player> players
      List of all the players in the game.
      java.lang.String session
      A unique identifier for the game instance that is being played.
      int timeAddedPerTurn
      The amount of time (in nano-seconds) added after each player performs a turn.

      • Fields inherited from class joueur.BaseGame

        gameObjects, name

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • boardHeight

        public int boardHeight
        The height of the board for the Y component of a checker.

      • boardWidth

        public int boardWidth
        The width of the board for X component of a checker.

      • checkerMoved

        public Checker checkerMoved
        The checker that last moved and must be moved because only one checker can move during each players turn.

      • checkerMovedJumped

        public boolean checkerMovedJumped
        If the last checker that moved jumped, meaning it can move again.

      • checkers

        public java.util.List<Checker> checkers
        All the checkers currently in the game.

      • currentPlayer

        public Player currentPlayer
        The player whose turn it is currently. That player can send commands. Other players cannot.

      • currentTurn

        public int currentTurn
        The current turn number, starting at 0 for the first player's turn.

      • maxTurns

        public int maxTurns
        The maximum number of turns before the game will automatically end.

      • players

        public java.util.List<Player> players
        List of all the players in the game.

      • session

        public java.lang.String session
        A unique identifier for the game instance that is being played.

      • timeAddedPerTurn

        public int timeAddedPerTurn
        The amount of time (in nano-seconds) added after each player performs a turn.

      • gameVersion

        public static final java.lang.String gameVersion
        The hash of the game version we have locally. Used to compare to the game server's game version.
